title: Laurent Huard
text:
Laurent Huard (born 26 August 1973 in <a href="Foug%C3%A8res">Fougères</a>, <a href="Ille-et-Vilaine">Ille-et-Vilaine</a>) is a French <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> coach who had a playing career. He is currently the assistant manager of <a href="AS%20Saint-%C3%89tienne">AS Saint-Étienne</a>.
Huard played for nine years at Stade Rennais, before stints at Sedan and Saint-Étienne. In 2002, he had to shorten his career due to heart problems.
